item.description:
Easy Kayaking

Sunday Sept. 16th. 10:30 am. to 2 pm.

Edgewater Canoe & Kayak

35 Edgewater drive, Hooksett, NH

Host: Steve Ob1.    603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Co-host: Rob Edgewater 603 540-6520

Boat rental $5. an hour 2 -3 hours total, parking included

If you bring your own boat , it's a $5 charge to park.

RAIN will cancel this meetup.

Bring friends, the kids, the dog. The summer is over. But the water is still warm. So, we can still have a great time on the river. This can be done by any skill level, beginner to expert.  So come, bring your boats, or rent one from Edgewater Canoe and Kayak, $5. an hour, 3 hour min. We will be paddling up the Merrimack river from there to Memorial field for our picnic lunch. Then we can paddle up river or around a bit more. We can also just head back. It's an easy 2 -3 hours total. Edgewater rents both single and double up kayaks.  Packed a lunch, sunscreen and water.

If your brand new? We will give you an easy paddle lesson, and make sure your doing ok. Plus, we will have a tow boat, as you can see in the photo above.

WARNING!  If the air is warm? Water gun fights have been known to break out.

The rental cost is only $5/ hr.

If you bring your own boat , it's a $5 charge to park. ( it helps pay for the porta  potty too) So see Rob when you arrive to give him your name and payment. We estimate 3 hours so it's $15. If you come back earlier the rest will be returned... then come find a boat and say hello to Steve Ob1. I will let Rob know how many so no need to call to reserve. See you then.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet us at the boat ramp or callor text me 603-491-1962

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Easy Kayak & Picnic
